# Protection From Spells (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]], [[6th Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 6]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 15th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 15]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (diamond worth 500 gp), F (One 1,000 gp diamond per target. 

   Each subject must carry the gem for the duration of the spell. If a subject loses the gem, the spell ceases to affect him.)

**Range:** Touch

**Targets:** Up to one creature touched per four levels

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 328

The subject gains a +8 resistance bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities (but not against supernatural and extraordinary abilities).
